config.DatabaseQuery:
SELECT  ROUND(X.Accepted/(X.Accepted+Y.Test)*100,2) AS "Leakage" FROM(
  (SELECT count(*) as "Accepted" FROM issueDetails
 id JOIN issues i ON i.issueKey=id.issueKey WHERE FIELD="status" AND _to IN ("In Progress") AND _from!="IN QA" AND status="Done"
	 AND i.issueType IN ("Bug")) X,(SELECT COUNT(*) AS "Test" FROM issueDetails id
	 JOIN issues i ON i.issueKey=id.issueKey WHERE FIELD="status" AND _to="IN QA" AND status="Done" AND i.issueType IN ("Bug") )Y)
